name: Bubble Crab
description:
A simple crab game for the weekly game jam 259 (:

The theme was "Bubbles"

The game is better on the downloadable version. If you still want to play it on browser, stay in full screen!

All ressources was create by me for this game jam except for musics. Thanks to Pro Sensory (Alex McCulloch) , Spring Spring and celestialghost8 from OpenGameArt for the beautiful musics! c:
